configuration.title: SVG
svg.minifySvg.title: Minify SVG
svg.prettySvg.title: Pretty SVG
svg.showSvg.title: Preview SVG
configuration.completion.showAdvanced.ti: Show advanced items in completion list.
configuration.completion.showAdvanced.de: Specifies whether advanced items that are not commonly used are displayed in the AutoComplete list.
Show deprecated items in completion list.
Specifies whether advanced items that are deprecated are displayed in the AutoComplete list.
configuration.completion.disableFormatOn: Focus Disable SVGO Format On Save event if editor.formatOnSave is true
configuration.format.plugins.title: SVGO plugins array.
configuration.format.plugins.description: Each items corresponds to a plugin that should be enabled, the rest is disabled.
configuration.pretty.plugins.title: SVGO plugins array.
configuration.pretty.plugins.description: Each items corresponds to a plugin that should be enabled, the rest is disabled.
configuration.version.title: SVG Version
configuration.version.description: Specifies the SVG standard version that will be used for autocompletion and validation.
configuration.preview.background.title: Svg Preview Background
configuration.preview.backgroundCustom.d: Specifies the Svg Preview Custom Background
